title: Azaad (2025) Bollywood Hindi Movie HD ESub - Ajay Devgn, Aman Devgan, Rasha Thadani (Action, Drama, History)
starcast: Ajay Devgn, Aman Devgan, Rasha Thadani, Diana Penty, Mohit Malik, Piyush Mishra, Jiya Amin, Dylan Jones, Akshay Anand Kohli
description: In 1920s India, a young stable boy named Govind forms an unbreakable bond with a fierce and untamed horse named Azaad.
